title: Launcher Crashes after successful log in.
body:
After I start LOL launcher, log in, and connect.. it says logging on, but gives me an error message and closes launcher. I usually do this several times before i finally get to my lol home screen. Does anyone know whats going on here? thanks in advance!
 PS- I have also never had this problem in earlier versions and use the same computer.

replies.body: That could be a DNS issue. Switch over to Google's one and see if it's the same.
